description:
This market will resolve according to the number of views the 'Bad Bunny's Apple Music Super Bowl Halftime Show' video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G6FuWd4wNd8), posted by the NFL's YouTube channel, gets in the first 72 hours after being posted. This market may not resolve until the 72 hours are complete, regardless of whether a strike is reached earlier.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

The resolution source for this market is the NFL's YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@NFL/videos), specifically the 'views' counter for the described video.

Note: This market refers to the NFL's specified video posted. Shorts, previews, or other videos released other than the referenced video will not be considered.

events.title: # of views of Bad Bunny's Halftime Show video day 3?

question: Will the Bad Bunny Apple Music Super Bowl Halftime Show video get between 78 and 80 million views on day 3?
